# This file contains a list of disallowed image domains for GitHub Actions

# GitHub
githubusercontent.com
github.com

# Social Media Platforms
facebook.com
fbcdn.net
instagram.com
cdninstagram.com
linkedin.com
licdn.com
pinterest.com
pinimg.com
threads.net
cdnthreads.com
tumblr.com
media.tumblr.com
twitter.com
pbs.twimg.com

# Video & Streaming Platforms
vimeo.com
vimeocdn.com
youtube.com
ytimg.com
googleusercontent.com

# Image & Photo Sharing Platforms
pixelfed.org
files.pixelfed.org

# Chat & Messaging Platforms
discord.com
discordapp.com
discordapp.net
discordcdn.com
slack.com
slack-edge.com
snapchat.com
sc-cdn.net
telegram.org
t.me
telegra.ph
telegram-cdn.org
wechat.com
wx.qq.com

# Short Video & Entertainment Platforms
tiktok.com
bytecdn.com
tiktokcdn.com

# Forums & Community Platforms
reddit.com
redditmedia.com
redd.it

# Blogging & Publishing Platforms
medium.com
cdn-images-1.medium.com
mastodon.social
files.mastodon.social

# Other Platforms (General purpose / Multi-use)
qq.com
qlogo.cn
